author: pbs.org
title: October 2, 2015 Charlie Rose The Week
text: Tonight on the program: A look at Vladimir Putin's UN Speech and Russia's latest moves in Syria with former CIA acting director Mike Morell, British Prime Minister David Cameron and French foreign minister Laurent Fabius. Plus: POLITICO's Mike Allen on the latest Washington news, an interview with Clare Danes on the new season of 'Homeland' and a performance by singer-songwriter Ed Sheeran.
